name: Parent Portal for JCPS
description: Galaxy background to replace the boring green one, as well as a more clean look to the login screen. It was created to make the visual appearance more pleasing as well as bold important words(Such as grades). Removes unnecessary text.

user.name: Messier
user.about:
If you have any problems with any of my styles, please send me the problem and I will do my best to fix it. 
You can request styles either at my spam email or through Howrse.
Howrse username: j7t85jf84 hfgb3

additional_info:
Change Log:

9/10/17 - Removed the bottom half of screen, no password reset or bulky text.

6/2/16 - 
Fixed the bug where the background photo shows up in table in links on the grades page.

5/12/16 - 
Not global finally.

5/10/16 -
Working on making this style NOT global, hang in there...

5/6/16 -
Please do not steal. If you use the code, please credit. Tested in Chrome on Windows and Mac. 
*On login, the notification bell image is missing. But link still works.
